message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hi Alice, I understand your point, but $13,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my revised offer?
